title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

examples.end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
author: Vexed01 (Vexed#3211)
examples.install_msg:
Thanks for installing! If you find anything that's wrong or want to chat, feel free to make a GH issue or find me in the main Red server or in the cog support server - I'm Vexed#3211.
<discord.gg/red> <discord.gg/GET4DVk>
